    • Method Detail

      • testAttemptChangeUserRoles

        public void testAttemptChangeUserRoles()
                                throws java.lang.Exception
        Test to see if we can modify the collection of roles. We don't support modification of the Collection of roles so we want to make sure an exception is thrown if the collection is attempted to be modified.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
